title: Fall 2015 Repertoire Concert- Program B
desc:
Marymount Manhattan College's Fall Repertoire Concert Program B 
 
 Program B features choreography by: Alexandra Damiani, Pedro Ruiz, Sabatino Verlezza, and Megan Williams. 
 Program A features choreography by: Catherine Cabeen, Alexandra Damiani, Tito Del Saz, and Anthony Ferro. 
 For tickets to Program A, follow this link:? http://mmcdancefa15.eventbrite.com 
 
 This season the MMC Dance Department will present distinguished works by faculty members and guests in its fall concert series held in the Theresa Lang Theatre. In keeping with the philosophy of the Department, the program will provide a variety of styles. The department?s desire to showcase new and contemporary works remains at the heart of its mission. 
 MMC or Student ID must be shown at door for MMC or Student Tickets. 
 No refunds. 
 Photography and Video are Strictly Prohibited. 
 Waitlist for sold out events begin 1 hour before show time at the Box Office.
